pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Package for Extended Behavior Genetics Analysis // Provides functions for behavior genetics analysis, including variance component model identification [Hunter et al. (2021) doi:10.1007/s10519-021-10055-x], calculation of relatedness coefficients using path-tracing methods [Wright (1922) doi:10.1086/279872; McArdle McDonald (1984) doi:10.1111/j.2044-8317.1984.tb00802.x], inference of relatedness, pedigree conversion, and simulation of multi- generational family data [Lyu et al. (2024) doi:10.1101/2024.12.19.629449]. For a full overview, see Garrison et al. (2025) doi:10.21105/joss.06203.
